    etri.sdn.controller.module.linkdiscovery  
    etri.sdn.controller.protocol.packet  

    • Uses of LLDP in etri.sdn.controller.module.linkdiscovery

      Methods in etri.sdn.controller.module.linkdiscovery with parameters of type LLDP 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private boolean OFMLinkDiscovery.handleLldp(LLDP lldp, IOFSwitch sw, org.openflow.protocol.interfaces.OFPacketIn pi, boolean isStandard, java.util.List<org.openflow.protocol.OFMessage> outgoing)
      From the LLDP packet received, this method first extract following information: remote switch information controller id (if this message is created by a controller) direction of the message The business logic of this method are as follows: if the message is a standard LLDP which is not created by this controller, then drop it.
